resources.string: Each card can be distinguished by color, shape, number, and shading.
Choose 3 cards for which those characteristics are either all the same, or all different.
If two cards are the same shape, they must all 3 be the same shape, or all different shapes.
Use the sort buttons to help you see the patterns.
Sets are worth from 10 to 25 points, depending on how many characteristics are different.
Extra points are also given when there are more than 12 cards to choose from.
Cards are added to the layout until there is at least one set to be found.
ToMarGames are open source and free to play.
Online games, and apps for PC, Mac, and Android.
All games are coded in Java by marie.
